text: hello friends I am Niharika and welcome
back I have a question for you are you
tired of office politics yes well there
are difficult people at every workplace
they're annoying they're mean they try
to grab bosses positive attention they
also try to grab your power privilege
and the spotlight so how do you deal
with such difficult people the difficult
co-workers because they come in variety
so in today's lesson I'm gonna help you
with four productive ways to deal with
these typical people at your workplace
